Name: Fate
Description: Grants flight and one   Eternal Heart.

Name: Abel
Description: Spawns a familiar that mirrors Isaac's movements and shoots in the opposite direction. Spawns a familiar that mirrors Isaac's movements and shoots towards him.

Name: Bob's Brain
Description: Spawns a familiar that charges forward when shooting tears and explodes upon contact with an enemy, damaging and poisoning them. The familiar respawns after a few seconds.

Name: Cricket's Head
Description: Increases Damage by 0.5, and increases damage multiplier by x1.5.

Name: Goat Head
Description: A  Devil Room /  Angel Room will always spawn after every boss fight, excluding the first floor and floors after Chapter 4.

Name: Infamy
Description: Gives Isaac a 50% chance to block projectiles coming from any direction.

Name: Fate's Reward
Description: A blue head familiar that will follow Isaac and fire tears copying his tear effects and damage.

Name: Head of the Keeper
Description: Isaac's tears become coins and now have a chance to drop Pennies on the floor upon successfully hitting an enemy.

Name: Steven
Description: +1 damage.

Name: Blood Bag
Description: Grants one filled Red Heart container, restores 4   Red Hearts, and increases speed by 0.3.

Name: Bomb Bag
Description: Spawns a familiar that drops a   Bomb every 3 rooms.

Name: Little Baggy
Description: Isaac can hold 2 pills at once and all cards and runes are replaced by pills.

Name: Mystery Sack
Description: Spawns a familiar that drops a Heart, coin,   Bomb, or   Key every 5-6 rooms.

Name: Rune Bag
Description: Spawns a familiar that drops a random rune after clearing enough rooms.

Name: Sack of Pennies
Description: Spawns a familiar that drops a   coin every 2 rooms.

Name: Sack of Sacks
Description: Spawns a familiar that drops a   Grab Bag every 5-6 rooms cleared.

Name: The Belt
Description: Increases speed by 0.3.

Name: Binky
Description: Grants one   Soul Heart, +0.75 tears and decreases Isaac's size.

Name: Consolation Prize
Description: Increases Isaac's lowest stat and drops either 3   Coins, 1   Bomb, or 1   Key depending on what Isaac has the least of.

Name: Crack Jacks
Description: Grants one full Red Heart container and drops a random trinket.
Quote: HP up. Don't swallow the prize!

Name: Dad's Lost Coin
Description: +1.5 range, +1 tear falling speed. Drops a Lucky Penny.+2.5 range. Drops a Lucky Penny.

Name: Glass Eye
Description: +0.75 damage, +1 luck.

Name: Latch Key
Description: Grants 1   Soul Heart and +1 luck. Spawns 2   Keys.

Name: Magic 8 Ball
Description: +0.16 shot speed, spawns a random tarot card.  Increases the chance of finding a  Planetarium.

Name: Match Book
Description: Grants Isaac one   Black Heart, spawns two or three   Bombs.

Name: Midnight Snack
Description: Grants one full Red Heart container.  Heals 1 additional   Red Heart.

Name: Mom's Pearls
Description: +1.25 range, +0.5 tear falling speed, +1 luck. +2.5 range, +1 luck. Grants one   Soul Heart.

Name: Mom's Ring
Description: +1 Damage. Drops a random Rune or Soul Stone upon pickup.

Name: Mom's Underwear
Description: +5.25 range, +0.5 tear falling speed. +2.5 range. Spawns 3-6 Blue Flies on pickup.

Name: Mr. Dolly
Description: +0.7 tears, +5.25 range, +0.5 tear falling speed, Spawns a combination of 3   Red Hearts,   Soul Hearts or   Black Hearts on the floor when picked up. +0.7 tears, +2.5 range, spawns 3 random types of   Hearts on the floor when picked up.

Name: A Quarter
Description: Gives Isaac 25   coins.

Name: Screw
Description: +0.5 tears, +0.2 shot speed.

Name: Squeezy
Description: Increases tears by 0.4, spawns 2   Soul Hearts.

Name: Stapler
Description: +1 Damage. Prevents Isaac from firing tears from his left eye, like   Cain.

Name: Torn Photo
Description: +0.7 tears, +0.16 shot speed.

Name: Wire Coat Hanger
Description: Increases tears by 0.7.

Name: PJs
Description: Grants 4   Soul Hearts and fully restores Isaac's health.

Name: Schoolbag
Description: Allows Isaac to hold two active items.

Name: Lead Pencil
Description: After every 15 tears fired, Isaac will fire a high-damage cluster of tears.

Name: Orphan Socks
Description: Prevents creep and floor spikes from damaging Isaac. Also gives Isaac +0.3 speed and 2   Soul Hearts.
Quote: Speed up + your feet feel stronger
